name: The Horde: REMASTERED
description: Welcome to your new job as a security guard for Yortusin's Diner, Bob. You will stay here from 12:00 to 6:00, like any other regular cliche place where deadly robots and cover up stories are the norm. Make sure the robots do not kill you, as that would ruin our reputation. WE REMEMBER that you're the one behind the robots, and now they're your problem. Don't die on us, or else we will have to spend more money on your service...
